attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ask Tony Blair to apologise and admit to the Iraq people and the world that the trial and hanging of Saddam Hussein was anti-humanitarian and that Saddam did not get a fair hearing from a world humanitarian court made up from people of different countries. And to also state that Democracy is useless without an overall controlling humanitarian court by which such leaders can be judged so as to eliminate any control or manipulation by any internal or external police/army style force.
